entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [8.0] Build failure in linux.riscv64.Checked - No usable version of clang found #100564
  • Test suite crash in new exception handling #100563
  • WasmApp.Native.targets warning WASM0001: Could not get pinvoke, or callbacks for method 'System.Tests.TimeZoneInfoTests+WindowsUILanguageHelper::EnumUILanguages' because 'Parsing function pointer types in signatures is not supported.' - ProxyProjectForAOTOnHelix.proj #100562
  • Uninitialized memory usage in MethodTableBuilder #100559
    9.0.0
  • System.IO.Net5Compat.Tests and System.IO.Tests suddenly exiting with error 137 #100558
  • Package support for Azure Linux 3.0 #100557
  • Incremental builds failing because of missing FireEtwGCDynamicEvent #100556
  • DataContractJsonSerializer not passing ISerializationSurrogateProvider to internal xml serializer #100553
  • Introduce `SwiftSelf<T>` and `SwiftIndirectResult` to represent Swift structs and enums in C# #100543
    9.0.0
  • JsonSerializer doesn't support valid TimeSpan formats #100538
    Future
  • Is it possible to implement a self-referential static abstract interface method in Reflection.Emit? #100537
  • Vectorized implementation of TensorPrimitives.Pow is broken for negative values #100535
    9.0.0
  • [HTTP/3] [HttpStress] QuicException: Stream aborted by peer (258) in `(POST Duplex | PUT) Slow` #100534
    9.0.0
  • Request for analyser ICU usage and/or TZ data #100531
  • QuicListener Not Including Intermediary Certificates Without Explicit ServerCertificateContext #100530
  • [HttpStress] Consider adding a nightly HTTP/3.0 leg with standard Release MSQUIC build #100529
    Future
  • [WASM] When AOT is used it throws Arg_InvalidCastException #100527
    9.0.0
  • RuntimeException with Incorrect Advice #100524
  • Running multiple .net core containers on a single node #100521
  • System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer: A non-collectible assembly may not reference a collectible assembly #100519
  • XmlSerializer does not work with collections in collectible ALC #100518
  • HttpClient without initial proxy auth limits web scraping capability #100515
  • Enable allocation of singletons on frozen heap in shared generic code #100510
    Future
  • [NativeAOT/linux-arm] Determinism test failure #100508
  • [NativeAOT/win-x86] System.Runtime.Tests crash #100507
  • Can we avoid resetting all env vars for some remotely executed tests? #100505
  • [API Proposal]: Task.WhenAll to return results in a strongly typed tuple #100504

Closed

  • Heap corruption when Target OS is set #100544
  • [API Proposal]: `InvalidEnumArgumentException` should support `uint/long/ulong`-backed enumerations #95696
    9.0.0
  • STJ: JsonNode.ReplaceWith used with an array will result in a node that identifies as array but is not a JsonArray node #100470
  • [API Proposal]: JsonNode.ReplaceWith #100468
  • [API Proposal]: Add JsonSerializer.Deserialize(ReadOnlySequence) #100478
  • Text.Json fails to serialize schema with properties of derived overloaded classes #100523
  • Debug.Assert exception I encountered when using Debug version System.Private.CoreLib.dll with mono runtime #96324
  • TLS 1.3 negotiation fails with FIPS-enabled Ubuntu 22.04 server and Chromium based browsers #99289
    8.0.x
  • Awaiting nongeneric Task.WhenAll changes behavior in .NET 8 to throw the last exception instead of the first #93504
  • Browser SignalRClientTests failing in CI #100307
    9.0.0
  • SslStream.AuthenticateAsClient() is popping up a challenge for the system keychain on MacOS #99335
  • System.Threading.Timer uses wrong TimeSpan property for "period" on linux-bionic-arm native aot #100332
  • Test failure: Interop/NativeLibrary/Callback/CallbackStressTest_TargetUnix/CallbackStressTest_TargetUnix.cmd #99885
  • Empty array allocated on the Frozen Heap for a Collectible type? #100437
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Making "Process asynchronous tasks as they complete" easy by using IAsyncEnumerable #61959
    9.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Implement RuntimeHelpers.Box #100561
    area-System.Runtime, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Fix use of uninitialized `bool` value #100560
    area-VM-coreclr
  • JIT: fix early convergence in profile count solver #100552
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Delete dead code #100551
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add Channel.CreateUnboundedPrioritized #100550
    area-System.Threading.Channels, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Arm64: Fix sve unit tests #100549
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-arm64-sve
  • Cleanup of `fx_resolver_t` and tests in `NativeHostApis` #100542
    area-Host
  • JIT: Disable more_tailcalls under GCStress #100540
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Add ABI classifier for arm32 #100526
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add log to SendAsync_SlowServerRespondsAfterDefaultReceiveTimeout_ThrowsHttpRequestException. #100525
    NO-REVIEW, area-System.Net
  • [wasm] Enable System.Runtime.Serialization.Schema.Tests for HybridGlobalization on v8 #100522
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization, disabled-test
  • [browser][mt] Fix `SignalRClientTests` timeouts #100516
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono
  • Avoid frequent calls to CertificateValidationPal.IsLocalCertificateUsed #100513
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Fix building x86 Windows native AOT runtime packs #100512
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [release/8.0] Avoid allocating collectible instances in the frozen heap (#100444) #100509
    Servicing-approved, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.5
  • Add three-stage enqueuer/dispatcher scheme to SocketAsyncEngine, ThreadPoolWorkQueue and ThreadPoolTypedWorkItemQueue #100506
    area-System.Threading

Merged

  • Update branding to 8.0.5 #100547
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure
  • Update branding to 7.0.19 #100546
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure
  • Update branding to 6.0.30 #100545
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure
  • Disable System.Net.Quic tests on arm32 #100514
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Allow for setting of isOfficialBuild when uploading intermediate artifacts #100528
    area-Infrastructure
  • SPMI: Fix Python 3.12 warnings in superpmi.py #100533
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix interop test log statement #100511
    area-Interop-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-staging][mono][debugger] Fix inspect Span<byte> #99844
    Servicing-approved, area-Debugger-mono, 8.0.5
  • Fix more diagnostics with CA2263 #100490
    area-Meta
  • [browser][MT] fix error propagation when calling JSImport of missing JS function #100408
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Add JitOptRepeat to JIT experimental AzDO pipeline #100326
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [browser] reduce sample re-link #100517
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [browser][wbt] SignalRClientTests - wait for selectors of all the buttons #100450
    arch-wasm, area-VM-meta-mono
  • [release/8.0] Don't unset ALPN list pointer during ALPN selection callback. #99670
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net.Security, os-linux, 8.0.5
  • Fix allocation of empty array in the frozen heap for collectible types #100444
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • JIT: Add separate ABI classifiers for x86/win-x64/SysV-x64/ARM64 #100276
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add Task.WhenEach to process tasks as they complete #100316
    area-System.Threading.Tasks, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Make JitOptRepeat available in Release builds #100494
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Updated

  • Guard against -1 Returned from sysconf for the Cache Sizes Causing Large Gen0 Sizes and Budgets for Certain Linux Distributions. #100502
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [wasm] Use source built emsdk packages for the runtime build #100266
    area-Build-mono
  • JIT: Support Swift error handling for reverse P/Invokes #100429
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Scalar/Packed conversions for floating point to integer #97529
    breaking-change, area-CodeGen-coreclr, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, community-contribution
  • [mono] Migrate various GHashTables to dn_simdhash #100497
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, needs-area-label
  • Update JIT sources to clang-format/clang-tidy 17.0.6 #100498
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Rebase the installer build jobs on the global build job template #100110
    area-Infrastructure-installer
  • Remove remaining CRT PAL wrappers and enable including standard headers in the CoreCLR build #98336
    area-PAL-coreclr
  • [mono][interp] Reduce false pinning from interp stack #100400
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'release/6.0-staging' #99584
    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow
  • Vectorized `GetNonRandomizedHashCode` #98838
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • DATAS tuning changes for small HCs #100390
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Allow setting ZipArchiveEntry general-purpose flag bits #98278
    area-System.IO.Compression, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, community-contribution
  • Add type-specialized vectorized hash table container #100386
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • STJ: Dispose enumerator on exception #100194
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • Remove DAM annotations from enum converter #100347
    area-System.ComponentModel, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Simplified muxer fix #99576
    area-Host
  • Enable FEATURE_PERFMAP on OSX, and update perfjitdump.cpp to work on OSX #99986
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, community-contribution
  • TypeName parsing API #100094
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata, new-api-needs-documentation, 9.0.0
  • [infra] Enable trimming on Helix for Apple mobile #96169
    area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 9.0.0
  • [browser][MT] Handling blocking wait #99833
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [browser][MT] mono_wasm_schedule_synchronization_context #100251
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Getting vxsort working on Linux amd64 #98712
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [ILLink] Fix origin for warnings due to event methods #100500
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • [browser] load core assemblies first #100141
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [browser][MT] reduce managed transition on UI thread after start #100410
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [browser][MT] smaller thread pool #100415
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [release/8.0-staging] Ensure that Sse3.MoveAndDuplicate correctly tracks supporting SIMD scalar loads #100417
    Servicing-approved, area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-avx512, 8.0.5
  • [release/8.0-staging] Always zero-init if object contains pointers #100426
    Servicing-approved, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.5
  • Predicate registers #98258
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: initial profile repair #100456
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Expand host_runtime_contract to include the entry assembly and probing paths #100503
    area-Host
  • Disable default and ambient attribute at runtime with a feature switch #100416
    area-System.ComponentModel
  • JIT: Add support for frozen structs in Swift reverse pinvokes #100344
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Several improvements / simplifications in Regex #100315
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • [mono][infra] Enable linux-x64 Mono fullAOT llvm job on extra platforms #92057
    blocked, area-Infrastructure-mono, 9.0.0
  • Make mutable generic collection interfaces implement read-only collection interfaces #95830
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • [wasi] Select mono components #100407
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-wasi, 9.0.0
  • [wasm] use sbrk instead of emscripten mmap or malloc when loading bytes into heap #100106
    arch-wasm, area-VM-meta-mono
  • Synchronized description of destinationDirectoryName parameter #100330
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution
  • Use macros to form the ARM64 instruction format search table #100403
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Redesign the frame layout to avoid the redundant computation of the stackOffsets #99278
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [browser][ws] Do not duplicate code executed in `local_on_close` #99685
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [browser] `HybridGlobalization` correct `HashCode` ranges of skipped unicodes #97351
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization
  • [mono][HybridGlobalization] Fix ShortDatePattern year format to be "yyyy" #99908
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Globalization, os-ios, 9.0.0
  • Change all Cookie localized DateTime logic with Universal alternative #100489
    area-System.Net, community-contribution
  • Restore StubSecretArg from stack #100428
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: Fix LA64 and RISCV64 build errors on Windows #100099
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Implement `ShuffleUnsafe` methods #99596
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, tenet-performance, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • enable AutomaticOrManual_DoesntFailRegardlessOfWhetherClientCertsAreAvailable test #100496
    area-System.Net.Http, disabled-test, 9.0.0
  • [WIP][mono][infra] Experiments with runtime-extra-platforms pipeline #100389
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Force 2 iterations of OptRepeat #100473
    NO-MERGE, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Cleanup NativeAOT math helpers #100375
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Special casing `System.Guid` for COM VARIANT marshalling #100377
    area-Interop-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [cdac] Physical contract descriptor spec #100365
    documentation, area-Meta

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-02
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

Updated

  • NativeAOT-LLVM: package publishing broken #2539

PullRequests

Merged

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Delete `reglist.h` #2540

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Build_Components_WithDesktopMSBuild_Works appears to be failing flakily #39960
  • Machine-readable `dotnet test --list-tests` output #39957
  • Resolve `dotnet-watch` dependency to avoid CVE-2023-29331 scanner false positive #39955
  • Hope to support installation via Flatpak #39941
  • A source code nuget package defining a .cs.pp file fails to resolve the namespace if <RootNamespace> is not set in the project #39933
  • `Microsoft.NET.Build.Containers` version '8.0.202' warning is incorrect on `8.0.1xx` SDK #39931

Closed

  • `dotnet watch` support for launching program in a different working directory #29539
  • Add `-r` to `dotnet watch` #25612
  • dotnet watch doesn't respect configuration arg #36611
  • Value of DOTNET_WATCH inconsistent at build time #34055
  • Unable to use `[env:key=value]` directive with `dotnet watch` in 8.0.20x #39020
  • [Megathread] Infrastructure Issues #28442
  • Missing tag for v8.0.201 #39164
  • Getting the error CS0103 The name 'paramName' does not exist in the current context in terminal but not in IDE #39162
  • [dotnet-sdk-9.0.100-preview.3.24175.24] CS1061 error when building OrchardCore #39847
  • Microsoft.VisualStudio.JavaScript.Sdk - error MSB3073 (tsc: not found) #39906

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'release/8.0.2xx' #39971
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.4xx' => 'release/8.0.1xx' #39970
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.1xx' => 'release/7.0.3xx' #39969
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.3xx' => 'release/7.0.4xx' #39962
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.2xx' => 'release/8.0.3xx' #39961
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'release/7.0.1xx' #39959
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.1xx' => 'release/6.0.4xx' #39958
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • update warning message for containers package inclusion #39956
    untriaged, DO NOT MERGE, Area-Containers
  • Containers 8.0.3xx Package Release Notes #39942
    untriaged, DO NOT MERGE, Area-Containers

Merged

  • [release/8.0.2xx] skip CanSortByDownloadCountAndThenByName because it's blocking #39775
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/7.0.3xx] skip CanSortByDownloadCountAndThenByName because it's blocking #39779
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/7.0.1xx] skip CanSortByDownloadCountAndThenByName because it's blocking #39781
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/7.0.1xx] Migrate to 1ES templates for internal builds #39841
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update branding to 8.0.105 #39952
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update branding to 7.0.409 #39951
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update branding to 7.0.119 #39949
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Rewrite dotnet watch command line parsing #39618
    untriaged, Area-Watch
  • [release/8.0.2xx] Migrate to 1ES templates for internal builds #39796
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/6.0.1xx] Migrate to 1ES templates for internal builds #39838
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/6.0.4xx] Migrate to 1ES templates for internal builds #39839
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/7.0.3xx] Migrate to 1ES templates for internal builds #39844
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update branding to 7.0.316 #39950
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update branding to 8.0.205 #39953
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update branding to 6.0.422 #39948
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update branding to 6.0.130 #39947

Updated

  • [release/7.0.4xx] Migrate to 1ES templates for internal builds #39845
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

    untriaged, Area-Tools

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-02
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • [Proposal]: Support generics and generic type parameters in aliases #1239
    Backlog
  • Champion: "&&= and ||= assignment operators" #1718
    Likely Never
  • [Proposal]: Partial properties #6420
    Working Set

PullRequests

Merged

  • Add proposal for "ref and unsafe in iterators and async" #7994

Updated

  • Update ref-struct-interfaces.md #8024
  • Adjust dynamic binding rules for a situation of a single applicable candidate. #8027

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Ensure existing usages of InterceptsLocationAttribute are onboarded to the new checksum-based approach #72855
  • Make MetadataDisplayFormat public #72844

Closed

  • `where` is not suggested when adding the first type constraint to a local function #72821
    Backlog
  • Unintuitive diagnostic when missing `>` in type argument list #48566
    Backlog
  • Poor error recovery after missing > #24642
    Backlog
  • False positive for CS1503 with MSBuild 17.10, but not dotnet build #72098

PullRequests

Created

  • Recommend extensions with matching constraints when the extension type is the generic type parameter #72853
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Add wait option to Replay #72852
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Fix a couple of issues with extension lookup/binding #72848
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Language Feature - Roles
  • Move Replay tool to the proper folder in solution explorer #72846
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Semantic snippets: Implement `do` snippet #72842
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged

Merged

  • Stop loading ISourceGenerators within VS entirely. #72835
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 2420562 #72854
    auto-merge
  • Remove ability for a project to change its language #72847
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Fix MEF import of to allow null #72851
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Semantic search #71268
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.10 to main #72850
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Use singular helper when creating checksums #72849
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Revert "Avoid creating result temp for is-expressions (#72273)" (#72827) #72845
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Add method name to TimeInQueue telemetry #72841
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 2420199 #72843
    auto-merge
  • Revert "Avoid creating result temp for is-expressions (#72273)" #72827
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, 17.10
  • Suggest `where` keyword in generic local function declarations #72838
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Move source-generators out of ProjectState and entirely into SolutinoCompilationState #72834
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Remove legacy TS EA api #72828
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Merge latest bits from `main` branch into extensions branch #72684
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Improve generic type argument list error recovery #69734
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Remove ServiceHub config for desktop host #72793
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Print diagnostics in invariant culture (English error messages) in assert text #72816
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.10 to main #72837
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Update Rename UI to accommodate for getting suggestions automatically #72790
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Merge release/dev17.10 to main #72836
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.10 to main #72806
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next

Updated

  • Merge release/dev17.10 to main #72856
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Provide option to only update source-generators on special events (like a build) #72494
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Add some crash dump tips for Linux #72719
    Area-Compilers, Documentation, untriaged
  • Consider `params` and default values when comparing signatures #71380
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Lambda Improvements, New Language Feature - Default lambda parameters
  • Add support for checksum-based interceptors #72814
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Improve parser recovery around nullable types in patterns #72805
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Support ref struct implementing interfaces in `foreach` and `using` statements #72810
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - RefStructInterfaces
  • Allow ref-like locals in iterators and async methods #72664
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Ref/Unsafe in Iterators/Async, 17.11
  • Implement find all references to preprocessing symbols #66425
    Area-Compilers, Community, Backlog
  • Warn for `yield return` in `lock` #72755
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Ref/Unsafe in Iterators/Async

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Blazor: add a @bind-value:before event #54916
  • Perf regression: plaintext #54909
  • Perf improvement: fortunes #54908
  • ForwardedHeadersMiddleware isn't setting X-Original-Proto correctly #54904
  • Custom JSON converter does not respect passed options for conversion. #54901
  • [WebToolsE2E][ARM64]Failed to run .exe file with error "System.AccessViolationException: Attempted to read or write protected memory" from publish folder after publishing .NET 8.0 project against self-contained with single file #54899
  • Embiggen ASP.NET Core development exception page text #54896
  • Quickgrid footer missing #54895
  • Improve wrapping of values on ASP.NET Core development exception page #54894

Closed

  • Blazor WebAssembly dotnet watch run --pathbase=/ doesn't work in .NET 8 #52294
    8.0.x
  • IHttpContextAccessor is null #53143
  • Items dictionary is always empty in SignalR hub HttpContext #53569
  • Perf improvement: connectionclose, json #54898
  • One Dll File In Wasm #54888
  • Cannot submit the form because no form on the page currently has that name. #54854
  • Blazor Server memory analyzer tool? #54902
  • user-jwts cannot handle comments in JSON secrets.json, and does not inform which file is the problem #54814
  • InputText crash if mistyped attribute #54852

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Linebreak in Label,Text XAML not displayed in App #21605
  • iOS WebView in a Layout does not size properly #21604
  • App icon cannot be changed on iOS #21603
  • ScrollViewer ScrollX and ScrollY are wrong on Android #21602
  • . NET MAUI 7.0 & 8.0 HttpClientHandler.ClientCertificates is null #21601
  • Mutual Authentication: Certificate chain removed when connecting to server in MAUI app but not Xamarin Forms #21600
  • .Net MAUI File.ReadAllText fails with Exception. #21599
  • Starts running and pause in Program.cs #21598
  • MAUI's Entry.TextChanged event is not called if Entry.Text is bound #21597
  • Brand New MAUI app will not compile or run (android) - invalid filename #21596
  • .NET MAUI 8 FontImageSource image update under Android not rendered after page reloaded and after Display mode switched between Light and Dark. #21595
  • .Net MAUI- Page.BackgroundImageSource not working for iOS #21594
  • Maui .net 8 DatePicker and TimePicker do not use CultureInfo.CurrentCulture on Windows (WinUI) #21593
  • Maui IOS. CopyToAsync() #21592
  • MAUI - Windows Machine - run error 실행시 오류 #21591
  • .Net MAUI WebView inconsistent between iOS and Android #21590
  • Maui LineGeometry not working #21589
  • random crash on startup dotnet maui app android #21588
  • .NET MAUI Grid auto-size row height does not update correctly when items are added or removed from a ListView in that row, on iOS #21587
  • Net maui scrolling problem in version 17.10 preview 2 #21586
  • ShellContents navigation to the same ContentTemplate .Net Maui #21585
  • [BUG] Creating an End-aligned button that honors container bondaries / Button with EndAndExpand does not expand to cover available space #21584
  • [MAUI] Runtime Error When Using the Same x:Name Property in Inherited MAUI Components #21581
  • [iOS/Android] CollectionView scrolling performance worse in .NET MAUI when compared to Xamarin.Forms (lag/stutter) #21580
  • Resetting the button background creates a temporary button #21579
  • Ambiguous route when PopModalAsync #21577
  • Running app one day without touching it craching after move to other page #21576
  • AppThemeBinding : System.InvalidOperationException: 'Collection was modified; enumeration operation may not execute.' #21575
  • Allow cancellation of drag-and-drop reordering in CollectionView #21574
  • Unable to turn off Fast Deployment for .Net8 Maui Android project #21572
  • .NET MAUI Push then Pop - ambiguous routes on MAIN #21570
  • Deploying MAUI app on iOS Device throws error : ASN1 corrupted data. #21569
  • [MAUI][.NET8] System.InvalidOperationException will be thrown when clicking here to view full recipe. #21567

Closed

  • Debug start doesn't run the app, getting some errors #21084
  • Build fails due to problems with Android manifest generation. #21545
  • [regression/8.0.0-preview.6.8686] Button Click Ripple Effect Not Working In Android #17642
    .NET 8 SR4

PullRequests

Created

  • Remove update cell size call from bind #21606
  • [iOS] Fix issue that does not allow scrolling in WebView with PDF #21571
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-webview

Merged

  • re-fix 21525 #21578
  • [Android] Fix Ripple effect with custom background (alternative to #17821) #20412
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/drawing ✏️, area/controls 🎮, control-button

Updated

  • [Windows] Prevent image from covering text in buttons if the image is too big #21516
    platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, control-button
  • Resizetizer issues fixes - nuget bumps #16100
    area/single project ☝️, stale, Under Consideration
  • Make sure to await async test asserts (2) #20506
    area/testing, community ✨
  • [Android] Border with RoundRectangle - fix #21250
    area/controls 🎮, community ✨, control-border
  • [net9.0] Revert "[net9.0] [testing] Enable Windows UITests back (#20727)" #21560
  • Making sure FindMauiContext fallbacks to default for the title icon i… #21519
    community ✨
  • BindableObject System.NullReferenceException when bindings queue gets messed up #21523
    community ✨
  • Add missing Android Systemfonts #21207
    platform/android 🤖, area/fonts 🅰️, community ✨
  • Document NavigableElement #21507
    area/navigation 🧭
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #21092
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, do-not-merge, area/infrastructure 🏗️

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • does Entity Framework Core tools reference - .NET Core CLI support managed identity? #33464

  • LazyLoader.Load remove ConcurrentDictionary _isLoading #33441

    9.0.0-preview3
  • Could not load type 'SqlGuidCaster' from assembly Microsoft.Data.SqlClient #33430

Created

Updated
